description: Non material amendment to planning permission P2013/3484 dated 12 September 2014. The proposed amendments are: 1. Alterations to Phoenix Place elevation including removal of external cladding and integral flues; 2. Amendments to internal layout including relocation of access cores, kitchen, bin stores and WCs and 3. Amendment to wording of Condition 12 to allow public access to the 'event space' for the purposes of using the toilet facilities at car depot level.
decision_conditions:
Condition 3 of planning permission P2013/3484/FUL now reads as follows:

CONDITION:  The 'event space' within the Car Depot of the existing site hereby approved for a temporary period of five years from the date of this permission shall not be open to the public outside the hours of: 

6pm - 11pm (7 days per week)

With the exception of (maximum) 25 events per year which shall not operate outside the hours of:

6pm - midnight (only on a Friday or Saturday night)

After five years, unless agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority, the hours of operation shall be reduced so that the 'event space' and Car Depot shall not be open to the public outside the hours of:

6pm - 10pm (7 days per week)

Staff would be permitted to close up the premises for a maximum 30 minutes beyond the above times.

Nothing in this condition shall preclude the use of the 'event space' as a route for visitors of the Mail Rail Exhibition and Ride to access the toilet facilities located in the 'event space'.

REASON:  To ensure that the proposed development does not have an
adverse impact on neighbouring residential amenity (existing and future).
